oai_dc:dc.dc:title: S. Hurok Inc. presents Anna Pavlowa and her Ballet Russe, 1924
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A program from a dance program performed by Anna Pavlowa and her Ballet Russe on February 27, 1924, presented on tour by concert agent-impresario Sol Hurok. The show was at the Ryman Auditorium on Fifth Avenue North in Nashville, Tennessee. Anna Pavolwa was a world-famous Russian ballet dancer who later became an early film star for Universal. Forms part of the Naff Collection. 1 program : col. ; 5.5 x 8 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Pavlova, Anna, 1881-1931; Hurok, Sol, 1888-1974
Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.)
